name: Scary Escape Time: Chapter 2
description:
The story of this game is all about escape of a brave survivor from evil house. The evils trapped you in the house of horrors but you have to escape by playing spooky house levels. Be brave and tricky and dont make noise because she is moving around to catch you. If you caught and trapped then she will kill you. Find the required things to unlock doors and to escape successfully. This escape game is full of thrill, adventure and creepy tasks to do.

Game Features:
Horror theme environment
Terrible horror sounds
Quality graphics
Complete escape story levels

Are you ready to accept challenges to escape from creepy house without getting caught?
